trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle keyboard-related routed events.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 관련 라우트된 이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the KeyboardEventHandler delegate.
trans-unit.target: 에 없는 기존 이벤트 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] KeyboardEventHandler 대리자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: KeyboardEventHandler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> base class as its event data class.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardEventHandler는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>해당 이벤트 데이터 클래스를 기본 클래스</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> 를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> serves as the base class for the more specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> event data classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>보다 구체적인에 대 한 기본 클래스 역할을 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>이벤트 데이터 클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: These event data classes are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> delegates, and those delegates are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 이벤트 데이터 클래스에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>대리자 및 해당 대리자 사용 됩니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 등 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> 이벤트</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>
